metadata.title: C.P. Company PPC Evolution 9-Port Amplifier Signal Booster Cable TV
features: This item is intended for large homes or homes with 8-9 tvs/modems
This item intended to take away loss due to splitters and long cable runs that are associated with large homes and commercial applications.
Will not increase signal coming from provider, but rather prevent losing signal during distribution.
Upstream unity gain & Downstream unity gain
9 Port Amplifier and Splitter with nickel-plated C360 brass F-ports
description: This item is intended for large homes or homes with 8-9 tvs/modems. This is not a gain maker, it equalizes every port equally from every port that is used. If you are looking to boost signal, you may want to call your cable provider, this is not the product for you. This is intended to take away loss from splitters and lower upstream. If you do not understand what this means, you need to google it before purchasing. In no way shape fashion or form will this put a band-aid signal

title: BEST Coaxial F Type 75 Ohm Terminator | 10 Pack and PPC Evolution 9 Way Digital Coaxial Splitter
